mapper.select: SELECT pa.id, pa.attribute_id, pa.attribute_key, pa.attribute_name, pa.attribute_type_value, pa.attribute_value_id, pa.attribute_value_key, pa.attribute_value_name, pa.attribute_value_pic_ids, pa.product_id, pa.product_code, pa.creator, pa.modifier, pa.is_deleted FROM product_attribute pa WHERE pa.is_deleted = 0 AND pa.product_id = #{productId}
